serviceAgreement.p: The Client wishes the GreenBizCheck to provide the services and the GreenBizCheck is willing to provide the services to the Client on the terms and conditions set out in this contract.

ul.li: Acceptance of Terms & Conditions
Payment of Payment of annual fee
Access to restricted GreenBizCheck on-line assessment
Company completes assessment and submits to GreenBizCheck

Instant, comprehensive GreenBizCheck assessment (incl. score) of company's environmental standing
Each question has a different weighting to reflect its relative importance and impact
In order to reach certification companies will be required to achieve a 90% score for GreenBizCheck certification
GreenBizCheck assistance to reach benchmark
Annual audit (online self-audit or physical audit), payment of annual fee and renewal of certification
Access to restricted website content and assessments
A step-by-step guide for attaining certification
A practical assessment to dramatically improve environmental impact
Voluntary Carbon Compensation Programme
National exposure on GreenBizCheck's website, e-publications and promotional material
Company eco-business policy document
Fact and Info Sheets e.g.:

Environmental days
Enviro-facts
Recycling and recycled paper
Energy Star Rating

Support Material e.g.:
Staff introductory email
Paperless office guide
PC and laptop efficiency guide
Comprehensive guide to using your environmental credentials to improve profitability
Template emails and assessment for suppliers, landlords, body corporate and cleaning company
Reminder stickers
Free environmental assessment for home use

Lists of suppliers:
Eco-friendly product suppliers
Green Power providers
All your recycling needs (paper, bio-degradable cleaning products, toner recyclers, mobile phone recyclers, energy efficient lighting, non-toxic furniture)
Signed statement of GreenBizCheck certification
Staff copy of Al Gore's "An Inconvenient Truth"
Yearly online or physical audit of business
GreenBizCheck e-newsletter

serviceAgreement.p: 1. (Application) These Terms and Conditions apply to the Certification Services provided by GreenBizCheck to the Client. These Terms and Conditions prevail over any other terms that may be communicated to the Client in writing or orally. No person acting or purporting to act on behalf of GreenBizCheck shall have authority to waive or change these Terms and Conditions orally. GreenBizCheck may vary these Terms and Conditions at any time by notifying the Client in writing.
2. (Certification Services) Under the Contract, GreenBizCheck agrees to provide and the Client agrees to accept the Certification Services requested by the Client.

3. (Assessment) The Client warrants that to the best of its knowledge and belief, all information made available to GreenBizCheck is complete and accurate in all respects. The Client agrees to provide GreenBizCheck with all cooperation and assistance necessary to enable GreenBizCheck to provide the Certification Services requested by the Client.
4. (Fees) The Client must pay to GreenBizCheck all Fees due in respect of the Certification Services provided by GreenBizCheck to the Client. The certification fees are to be paid annually.

5. (Certification) If: (a) the client is not in breach of these Terms and Conditions; and (b) after achieving the required standards in accordance with the Certification Procedures, GreenBizCheck is satisfied that certification is appropriate, GreenBizCheck will: (i) grant certification (ii) issue a Certificate to the Client; (iii) grant a licence to the Client to use the Certification Logo in accordance with the terms contained herein. If GreenBizCheck is not satisfied in its sole discretion that granting either Certification is appropriate, GreenBizCheck must notify the Client in writing. The Client acknowledges that the Certificate does not imply that any Certification is approved by any certification or governmental authority.

6. (Licence) Subject to clause 5. GreenBizCheck grants to the Client a non-exclusive licence to use the Certification Logo as a certification trademark. The Client agrees with GreenBizCheck: (a) to use the Certification Logo in accordance with the Licence and any reasonable directions issued by greenbizcheck from time to time; (b) not to alter, modify or deface in any way representations of the Certification Logo; (c) to notify GreenBizCheck of any suspected or actual unauthorised use of the Certification Logo which the Client becomes aware; (d) to provide all access and cooperation reasonably requested by GreenBizCheck to protect the Certification Logo and to ensure compliance with these Terms and Conditions; (e) not to represent that it owns or has any rights in relation to the Certification Logo other than the Licence; (f) not use the Certification Logo in any way that causes or is likely to cause confusion or deception; and (g) that the original and all copies of the Certification Logo and Certificate remain the property of GreenBizCheck and must be returned if requested by GreenBizCheck.

7. (Maintenance of Certification) The Client must maintain the required standards as certified and comply with all reasonable requirements of GreenBizCheck, including the payment of annual Certification Fees, that GreenBizCheck considers necessary to ensure that Certification continues to be appropriate. The Client must promptly notify GreenBizCheck in writing of any change in relation to the services so certified by greenbizcheck.

8. (No Misrepresentation) The Client must not engage in any conduct which might mislead, deceive or confuse any person in relation to or otherwise misrepresent the nature, status, scope or effect of its Certification by GreenBizCheck. The Client must promptly comply with any directions given by greenbizcheck to correct any conduct or misrepresentation in breach of this clause.
9. (Term) Subject to these Terms and Conditions Certification and the Licence will commence on the date certification is granted and be valid for one full year.

10. (Intellectual Property) The Client acknowledges and agrees that: (a) GreenBizCheck is the owner of all copyright, know-how and other intellectual property rights in the Certification Logo, Certification Procedures and any associated documentation; and (b) no right, title or interest in the Certification Logo, Certification Procedures or that documentation is transferred to the Client under the Contract.

11. (Insurance) The Licensee warrants that valid and enforceable public liability, product liability, professional indemnity and workers' compensation insurance policies are maintained to cover potential liability of: a) The Licensee arising out of this agreement; and b) GreenBizCheck arising out of the Licensee's breach of these terms and conditions or any act or omission of the Licensee.

12. (Confidentiality) GreenBizCheck undertakes to maintain confidential all conversations and documents reviewed and produced while undertaking this assignment. The client agrees that all intellectual property of GreenBizCheck (including assessments and methodologies) is confidential and not to be passed on to any third party.
13. (Warranty) The Client warrants to GreenBizCheck that the Certification Logo will only be used in accordance with the Licence, unless otherwise approved in writing by GreenBizCheck.

14. (Limitation of Liability) To the extent permitted by law all conditions or warranties implied by statute (including, without limitation, Trade Practices Act 1974) or common law are excluded from these Terms and Conditions. Greenbizcheck's liability for anything in relation to this Contract (however arising) is limited at its option to: (a) providing the Certification Services again; or (b) paying the cost of having the Certification Services supplied again. To the extent permitted by law, GreenBizCheck excludes liability for any loss or damage suffered by the Client (whether direct, indirect or consequential) arising in any way out of the services (including defective services) provided by GreenBizCheck or out of the services provided by the Client, the subject of the Certification or any act or omission of GreenBizCheck, including but not limited to profits lost and damage sustained or incurred as a result of a claim by a third party. GreenBizCheck will not be liable for any delay or failure to perform its obligations pursuant to this Agreement if such delay is due to a matter beyond its control or which could not have been reasonably foreseen.

15. (Assignment) a) Greenbizcheck may assign all or any of the rights under this Licensing Agreement. b) The Licensee must not assign or otherwise transfer all or any of its rights under the Agreement without the prior written consent of the GreenBizCheck.

16. (Indemnity) The Client must indemnify GreenBizCheck from and against all expenses, damages, costs and losses that GreenBizCheck may incur whether directly or indirectly, as a result of: (a) any breach of these Terms and Conditions by the Client; or (b) any loss of or damage to any property or injury to or death of any person: (i) caused by any negligent act or omission or wilful misconduct of the Client or its officers, employees and contractors; (ii) arising in connection with the services provided by the Client, the subject of the Certification.

18. (Termination) GreenBizCheck may suspend or terminate, at its option, the Certification and Licence issued to the Client with immediate effect by giving the Client written notice if: (a) the Client breaches any of these Terms and Conditions and fails to remedy the breach within 30 days after receiving notice requiring it to do so; (b) the Client breaches a material provision of these Terms and Conditions where that breach, in GreenBizCheck's reasonable opinion, is incapable of remedy; (c) GreenBizCheck receives three written complaints that the Client has breached Certification requirements; (d) GreenBizCheck reasonably believes that Certification is no longer appropriate; or (e) one of the following events occurs in relation to the Client: (i) it ceases to carry on business; (ii) it ceases to be able to pay its debts as they fall due; (iii) it disposes of the whole or any part of its assets, other than in the ordinary course of business; (iv) any step is taken by a mortgagee to take possession or dispose of the whole or any part of the Client's business; (v) any step is taken to enter into any arrangement between the Client and its creditors; or (vi) it becomes an externally administered body corporate (as defined in the Corporations Act 2001). Termination does not affect any accrued rights or remedies of either party. If the Certification and Licence issued to the Client expire or are terminated in accordance with these Terms and Conditions, the Client must immediately: (a) pay to GreenBizCheck all amounts due but unpaid by the Client; (b) cease using any Certification Logo; (c) withdraw from public display and return to GreenBizCheck the original and copies of the Certificate; (d) cease all advertising, promotions or other publication of the Certification issued to the Client; (e) take any steps reasonably required by GreenBizCheck to notify staff, customers and other third parties of the expiry or termination of the Client's Certification

19. (GST) If any goods and services tax (GST) is payable on any supply made by a party (supplier) to another party (recipient) under or in connection with this Contract, then the recipient must pay to the supplier the amount of such GST (to the extent that it is not already specifically included) in addition to the consideration otherwise payable for the supply. The supplier must provide the recipient with a tax invoice in such form as will permit the recipient to claim an input tax credit for the amount of such GST should it be so entitled. If the recipient is obliged to reimburse or indemnify the supplier for any amount paid or payable by the supplier to a third party (Third Party Payment), then: (a) the amount payable by the recipient shall be reduced by the amount of any input tax credit to which the supplier is entitled in relation to the Third Party Payment; and (b) the recipient will only be obliged to pay any applicable GST on that reduced amount.

20. (Terms of Payment) All fees for services to be supplied by GreenBizCheck are set out in the Schedule of Fees. Any other services supplied by GreenBizCheck in addition will be charged at the current rates. GreenBizCheck reserves the right to alter its current rates at any time. The Client shall make payment within 14 (fourteen) days of GreenBizCheck rendering an invoice. It the Client postpones, cancels or terminates this agreement (other than for a breach by GreenBizCheck) prior to the services being supplied, GreenBizCheck reserves the right to charge a fee equivalent to 30% of the total fee agreed between the two parties, which amount will not be offset against any future fees or charges owing by the Client to GreenBizCheck.

21. (General) (a) Each party will take all steps and do all such things as may be reasonably requested by any other party to give effect to any of the transactions contemplated by these Terms and Conditions; (b) This Contract will be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of Queensland and the parties submit to the non-exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of such state; (c) Any provision of the Contract which is prohibited or unenforceable in any jurisdiction will, as to such jurisdiction, be severed from this Contract without invalidating the remaining provisions of this Contract or affecting such provision in any other jurisdiction; (d) This Contract binds and benefits the parties and their respective legal personal representatives, successors, and permitted assigns; (e) This Contract constitutes the entire agreement between the parties in relation to its subject matter. Any prior arrangements, agreements, representations or undertakings are superseded and replaced by this Contract; (f) the relationship of the parties is one of independent contractors. Nothing in this Contract will be construed as rendering the relationship one of principal and agent, partnership or joint ventures; (g) The Client must not assign or otherwise transfer or attempt to assign any right or obligation under this Contract.

22. (Disclaimer) Although the information and recommendations are presented in good faith and believed to be correct, GreenBizCheck makes no representations or warranties as to the completeness or accuracy of the information. Information is supplied upon the condition that the persons receiving same will make their own determination as to its suitability for their purposes prior to use. In no event will GreenBizCheck be responsible for damages of any nature whatsoever resulting from the use of its certification or other products. Whilst GreenBizCheck has taken every care to incorporate widely used best practice standard it cannot guarantee the accurateness of its certification and accepts no responsibility for any deviations, errors or omissions. In particular, GreenBizCheck may – in certain instances – not be able to capture a client's total carbon footprint due to the client's nature or complexity of business.
23. (Definitions) In these Terms and Conditions:
Certificate means a document issued by GreenBizCheck confirming that the Client has been awarded Certification;

Certification Logo means a symbol, word or other sign (as identified in the Certificate) that signifies that services provided by the Client to third parties have been certified by GreenBizCheck as meeting specified requirements;

Certification Procedures means procedures developed by GreenBizCheck and used in assessing services provided by the Client to third parties for the purposes of enabling GreenBizCheck to grant or maintain the Certification;
Client means the company, organisation or individual seeking Certification and named in the application for certification;
Contract means the contract between GreenBizCheck and the Client resulting from the Client's application for certification;
Fees means those fees set out in the application guideline for certification or as otherwise agreed by GreenBizCheck and the Client;
Licence means the licence granted pursuant to clause 6;
GreenBizCheck means GreenBizCheck Pty Ltd ABN 51 128 048 466;
